name: Dime Community Bancshares, Inc.
description: Dime Community Bancshares, Inc. is a financial services company that operates as a bank holding company. Founded in 1864, Dime is headquartered in Hauppauge, New York, and serves customers primarily in the New York metropolitan area. The company's principal subsidiary, Dime Bank, provides a wide range of financial products and services, including personal and commercial banking, mortgage banking, and investment services. Dime is committed to delivering exceptional customer service and fostering strong relationships within the communities it serves. The bank offers checking and savings accounts, home equity loans, business loans, and various investment products. With a focus on community engagement and sustainable growth, Dime actively participates in local initiatives and strives to support economic development in its service areas. The company has consistently demonstrated strong financial performance, and its shares are traded on the NASDAQ under the ticker symbol DCOM. Dime is dedicated to leveraging technology to enhance customer experience and streamline operations, ensuring that it remains competitive in the evolving banking landscape. Its mission is to empower customers through accessible financial solutions while maintaining a strong commitment to safety and soundness.

seo.meta_title: Dime Community Bancshares, Inc. | Financial Services and Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Dime Community Bancshares, Inc., a leading provider of banking and financial services in the New York area. Discover our range of products and commitment to community engagement.

faq.answer: Dime offers a variety of services including personal banking, commercial banking, mortgage services, and investment products.

faq.question: Where is Dime Community Bancshares headquartered?
faq.answer: Dime Community Bancshares is headquartered in Hauppauge, New York.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Dime Community Bancshares?
faq.answer: Kevin P. O'Connor is the CEO of Dime Community Bancshares, Inc.

faq.answer: Dime Community Bancshares was founded in 1864.
